name: Air Fryer Chicken Po Boys
description: Oh yeah, your long-weekend lunch plans are set with this classic Louisiana-inspired sandwich. The chicken is delightfully crunchy with a smoky, piquant flavour thanks to Cajun Fries Seasoning. Get the best sub buns or baguette you can find – soft on the inside and crisp crust on the outside.

ingredients.name: Cajun Fries Seasoning or Louisiana Seasoning
Chipotle Aioli or Roasted Garlic Aioli

preparation: Preheat the air fryer to 400° F.
In a bowl, toss chicken with oil.
In a shallow dish, combine seasoning and cornmeal. Using tongs or your hands, add chicken one piece at a time, rotating and pressing to coat with the seasoning mixture.

Place coated chicken in air fryer basket in a single layer and cook 10 min, or until chicken is cooked through, flipping at the halfway point. (You may need to do this in two batches, depending on the size of your air fryer.)
Meanwhile, slice tomatoes and shred lettuce.
Slice and toast buns, if desired. Spread aioli on buns. To assemble, divide chicken, lettuce, and tomato between buns along with additional toppings, if desired.
tips: Don't have an air fryer? Place coated chicken fillets in a single layer on Cooling Racks placed over Sheet Pan. Cook in a preheated oven at 425°F for 18–20 min, or until chicken reaches an internal temperature of 165°F.

products.name: Cajun Fries Seasoning
summary: We love to make our taste buds dance with this Cajun Fries Seasoning. This blend of premium herbs and spices creates an earthy, piquant flavour that tastes great and packs a punch. It's perfect for anyone who wants to add excitement and heat to their favourite snack. Sprinkle as much or as little as you like over your spuds for a healthy alternative to restaurant fries with added seasonings.

products.name: Louisiana Seasoning (1011503)
summary: A Cajun-inspired seasoning that brings the flavour with a medium-spice level.

products.name: Chipotle Aioli Mix
summary: Medium-spicy Southwestern flavor with noteworthy chipotle chili and smoked paprika. A crowd-pleasing condiment for your burgers, fries, fish tacos, burritos and anything else that needs a little extra kick.

products.name: Roasted Garlic Aioli Mix
summary: A creamy roasted garlic condiment for your burger, sandwich or use as a dip for fries or veg.

products.name: Sheet Pan
summary: Lightweight all-purpose baking sheet made from a single piece of aluminum, with a one-inch rim.

products.name: Cooling Rack (Set of 2)
summary: These space-saving cooling racks are an absolute must-have for every at-home baker or chef.
